page.title: 17EDUCATION
page.content:
The original buildings of Holy Trinity Primary School (situated in {School {Lane}) have interesting brick patterns ,as well as a bell tower, although the bell is no longer in situ. Approximiately 140 children attend the school, coming from the village itself ,{Maidenhead Court Park}as far as{ {Boulters Lock,}and a few from the outlying areas. The school is organised into 5 class groups, depending upon the age of each pupil.
{Cookham Rise Primary School}was established to provide for the large mixed council and private housing estate that developed to the east of { {Cookham Village,}between the 1950's and today. The largest Primary school in the area, catering for approximiately 240 children - it has a one storey building, with a few
